name: Crop Yield Prediction Accuracy
definition: The mean absolute percentage error between AI-predicted crop yield and actual harvested weight, used for food security planning under EU AI Act transparency requirements.

calculation_logic.abstract: Divide the absolute difference between actual yield and predicted yield by the actual yield, averaged across all parcels.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT AVG(ABS(actual_yield - predicted_yield) / NULLIF(actual_yield, 0)) FROM analytics.yield_forecasts WHERE harvest_year = 2024

name: Soil Organic Carbon (SOC) Index
definition: The concentration of organic carbon in the topsoil layer, critical for carbon sequestration credit validation.

calculation_logic.abstract: Mean carbon percentage measured via distributed IoT sensors and spectral analysis.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT AVG(carbon_percentage) FROM sensors.soil_telemetry WHERE sensor_type = 'NDVI_SPECTRAL' AND depth_cm <= 30
